name: Your Spaceport!
description:
HEY YOU!


Ever wanted to be in command of your very own space station? Did you ever want to manipulate the price of fuel that others pay for? Did you ever wish you could overcharge for repairs when a customer's ship is held together only by Ducktape and they ask for proper maintenance?


Everything mentioned above is possible in Your Spaceport!

You have the means of production. You can manufacture goods to then sell on the open market.

Receive ship orders from other factions and fulfil these orders. Make sure you have the supplies needed for shipbuilding as the customers don't like to wait for too long.


Speculate! Buy low, sell high that's the name of the game.


Research new ways to make a profit. Enhance your station and repair your defences.


Defend yourself from others who wish to steal your profits! Make your mark on this part of space and eradicate your competition.
